channel.title: Dr. Junwei Zhang - Academic & Professional Updates
channel.description: Latest updates, publications, and activities from Dr. Junwei Zhang - Meta Smart Glass GenAI Engineer, IEEE T-CSVT Associate Editor, Stanford CS Master

item.title: New Publication in IEEE T-CSVT
item.description: Our latest research on smart glass multi-modal systems has been accepted for publication.

item.title: New YouTube Video: GenAI Smart Glass Systems
item.description: Deep dive into the technical architecture of next-generation smart glass interfaces.

item.title: IEEE Senior Member Achievement
item.description: Honored to be recognized as IEEE Senior Member for contributions to the engineering field.

item.title: Bilibili中文讲解：多模态AI系统
item.description: 在B站分享了最新的多模态AI系统研究成果和技术解析。
